name: 8-Ball Daycare (ECGJ#6 submission)
description:
CW: PIXELATED BUT GOOFY BLOOD, SQUISHY SOUND EFFECTS

Your daycare is failing. Your livelihood is at stake. Can you take care of business?

8-Ball Daycare is a top down "toss-em-up" shooter where you must take your business into your own hands - literally! Collect kids from a rival daycare, the 8-Ball Daycare, to rack up points and save your daycare from bankruptcy!

- This game was made by -

Deltaryz - Art, Design,  Bug testing, UI

https://twitter.com/deltaryz

WoolyDrool - Code, Design, Additional SFX

https://twitter.com/woolydrool

- This game contains -

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3565-cruising-for-goblins
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

SFX from http://soundbible.com/ with additional recorded SFX by Wooly

- Special thanks -

Delta's friend Ahroo for helping us figure out an aiming bug

All our friends for helping us bug test and providing feedback

- Made for the Extra Credits Game Jam #6 -
